title: 171-A
statement: A. Mysterious numbers - 1time limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutInputThe input contains two integersa1,a2(0 ≤ai≤ 109), separated by a single space.OutputOutput a single integer.ExamplesInput3 14Output44Input27 12Output48Input100 200Output102

processed.result: You are given two integers, $a_1$ and $a_2$.  Calculate and output the sum of these two integers.
Given two numbers, find their sum.
